00001 #include <stdio.h>
00002 #include "mcstd.h"
00003 
00004 void isr(void)
00005 {
00006    /* toggle output so one can measure interrupt response time */
00007    cam16o(0, 1, 0, 16, 0xFF);
00008    cam16o(0, 1, 0, 16, 0);
00009 
00010    /* clear lam in unit and controller */
00011    camc(0, 1, 0, 10);
00012    cam_lam_clear(0, 1);
00013 
00014    /* re-enable crate demand */
00015    cam_interrupt_enable(0);
00016 
00017    printf("ISR\n");
00018 }
00019 
00020 main()
00021 {
00022    unsigned long d;
00023 
00024    /* initialize CAMAC */
00025    if (cam_init() < 0)
00026       return;
00027 
00028    /* crate zero and remove inhibit */
00029    cam_crate_zinit(0);
00030    cam_inhibit_clear(0);
00031 
00032    /* write data and read back */
00033    cam24o(0, 1, 0, 16, 0x123456);
00034    cam24i(0, 1, 0, 0, &d);
00035    printf("Read back %X, should be 123456\n", d);
00036 
00037    /* enable and clear LAM in unit */
00038    camc(0, 1, 0, 26);
00039    camc(0, 1, 0, 10);
00040 
00041    /* register service routine */
00042    cam_lam_enable(0, 1);
00043    cam_lam_clear(0, 1);
00044    cam_interrupt_attach(0, 1, isr);
00045 
00046    /* enable crate demand */
00047    cam_interrupt_enable(0);
00048 
00049    /* go into endless loop */
00050    while (1);
00051 }
